Hello  
Floris Text 15 Regular OT font?  
Alex

It’s Gerard Unger’s [Gulliver](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423150935/http:/www.gerardunger.com/fontstore/store-gulliver.html), which is “available exclusively to organisations and companies whose printing work will do justice to its space-saving capabilities.” Unger’s [Capitolium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423150935/http:/www.type-together.com/Capitolium%202) or [Coranto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150423150935/http:/www.type-together.com/Coranto%202) might work as substitutes.
